body_html:
Perhaps it is a documentation problem. the dtype of a distribution is the dtype of the *samples it emits *(the dtype of dist.sample(...)). log_prob is always going to depend on the dtypes of the logits / probabilities / whatever you passed to the initializer of the distribution.
…

body:
Perhaps it is a documentation problem.  the dtype of a distribution is the
dtype of the *samples it emits *(the dtype of dist.sample(...)).  log_prob
is always going to depend on the dtypes of the logits / probabilities /
whatever you passed to the initializer of the distribution.
